attributes.action: Take action on the youth mental health crisis
attributes.additional_details: The mental healthcare crisis is now a deep rooted issue that can only be addressed by radical funding and action. Despite promises, nothing at CAMHS has fundamentally changed since the (non ringfenced) £1.4 billion in funding was provided in 2015 and was spent to backfill cuts to other areas.
attributes.background: Review the efficacy of Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services and pledge that every child in need of mental healthcare will recieve it through the NHS within a month or otherwise the minimum recommended time by professionals. Establish an Early Intervention program for emerging health issues.
